Advertise with Classic Car Clubs

Connect with classic car enthusiasts across the UK

Reach thousands of classic car enthusiasts and owners across the UK through our growing platform. We offer a range of advertising opportunities for businesses that want to connect with our engaged audience.

Why Advertise with Us?

  • Reach a targeted audience of classic car owners and enthusiasts
  • Connect with club organizers and event planners
  • Promote your products or services to a passionate community
  • Flexible advertising options to suit your needs and budget

Advertising Options

Directory Banners

Premium banner placement on our club directory and search pages.

Event Sponsorships

Sponsor featured events and gain visibility throughout our event listings.

Newsletter Features

Feature your business in our monthly newsletter sent to classic car enthusiasts.

Custom Partnerships

Bespoke advertising solutions tailored to your specific marketing goals.

Contact Our Advertising Team

For more information about advertising opportunities, rates, and availability, please contact our commercial team:

Email: hello@zenified.uk
